meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>wild</kanji> <kanji>wave</kanji> will make for some <vocabulary>stormy seas</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>raging waves</vocabulary>. Don't go out in these kinds of waves.
readingMnemonic: The readings come from the kun'yomi readings of the kanji, 荒 (the secondary reading you learned with this kanji) and 波 (just the vocab version).
